faqs.q: How many calories in a 1/2 cup of blueberries?
What are the carbs in a 1/2 cup of blueberries?
faqs.a: Approximately 10.8 g total carbs, including 1.8 g fiber and 7.5 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are blueberries low in fat and protein?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.3 g fat and 0.6 g protein per 1/2 cup.

faqs.q: Do blueberries have cholesterol or sodium?
faqs.a: Negligible—0 mg cholesterol and 1 mg sodium per 1/2 cup.

faqs.q: How does frozen vs. fresh affect calories in blueberries?
faqs.a: Frozen are similar, often 2-4 kcal less per serving due to minimal processing.
